Rename example to index
Massive code cleanup, event correction & localStorage
Import example page into github pages
Make a rockin' example page thanks to @fgnass/spin.js
Make example page work with a fruit grid
Rename to icongrid and create "example" file
Finish import of icongrid from apps repository
fully abstreacted icongrid from app repo. you can now use icongrid to represent a customizable arrangement of anything.

completely rewrote datamanagement code to support merging with updated information. create/add/delete of items is all done with updates in-place, instead of tossing everything out and reconstructing everything. adding and deleting new apps now shows up in the dash on focus. (event to trigger would be nice)

rewrite icon panel to support arbitrary siced grids of icons, with drag/drop in and between pages, etc. all the features of the previous version, but now customizable. left to do: arbitrary offset into parent container, so it can work anywhere in a page
added timer to delay between page transitions when dragging, otherwise it is difficult to stop on the page you want.

lots of fixes: - dragging apps between pages works well and is persistent - timers are used in places to make user experience smoother. at least one more is needed. - empty page is added when dragging, to give room for moving - empty trailing pages are removed on drop - empty slots in pages are allowed and supported. animations are reasonable. - when dropping apps into full pages, overflows are propagated to subsequent pages. - lots of bug fixes

what's not implemented:
 - parameterizing and extending to 2D arrays of apps
after much hair-pulling, multipage app arranging works mostly correct. there are still a few post-move fixups to implement (page was already full, etc.)
dock state is now saved in repo, so app ordering changes are permanent
added shadow to dragged app, so it looks like it's above the other apps.
implemented animated app reordering in launcher. still need shadow, and savedashboardstate api doesn't seem to be working, so changes don't stick for now. to move an app, press and hold for 1 second.
fixed cursor over widget, and prevented text selection. cache app icons for speed and to eliminate redraw flicker.
